item.title: Ask your PDF: Retrieval-Augmented Generator (RAG) for SAFeÂ® for Teams Workbook
item.description: I built a simple RAG system that answers multiple-choice questions based on the content of an uploaded PDF file to allow users to quickly extract and synthesize information from complex and long documents.

item.title: Keypoint Detection using SIFT
item.description: This repository contains the **MANUAL** pythonic implementation of the Scale-Invariant Feature Transform (SIFT) algorithm using basic Python packages for computer vision applications.

item.title: Forecasting using K-means Fuzzy Hybrid Model
item.description: This project explores the use of a Hybrid model involving Fuzzy Inference Systems and K-Means clustering to perform time series forecasting.

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Unusual Uses For Olive Oil
item.description: This paper reviews unusual uses for olive oil throughout the Mediterranean world. Published in the Journal of Oleic Science, 2001.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: The Finer Points of Sausage Dogs
item.description: This paper studies the pulmonary efficiency of sausage dogs. Published in the Journal of Canine Science, 1998.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
